text: Tomb Princes are the sons of the Tomb Kings. Each of the kings of ancient Nehekhara had many heirs, but only one could succeed his father to the throne.
Vampires are the true masters of Undeath. Despite their curse, Vampires retain all of their devious intelligence, and hence all of their ambition and desire.
Masters of the ballistic arts, even in death Gunnery Wights maintain the lines and a steady flow of black powder.
The most powerful Hammurai of Ptra are turned into willing emissaries of Nagash, spearheads of doom.
Liche Priests are the undying members of the Nehekhara's Mortuary Cult, and they hold the secrets to Unlife.
Tomb Princes are the sons of the Tomb Kings. Each of the kings of ancient Nehekhara had many heirs, but only one could succeed his father to the throne.
Vampires are the true masters of Undeath. Despite their curse, Vampires retain all of their devious intelligence, and hence all of their ambition and desire.
Masters of the ballistic arts, even in death Gunnery Wights maintain the lines and a steady flow of black powder.
Liche Priests are the undying members of the Nehekhara's Mortuary Cult, and they hold the secrets to Unlife.
A single Banshee is a terrifying prospect, and even those warriors skilled enough to match blades with a Vampire have little defence against her unnatural screams.
